column9: I enjoy some brands on social media, especially clothing brands. Follow their newest trends and releases.

column9: Keeps me up to date on products

I think it offers a good place to promote a brand to wide audience across many demographics. Brands shouldn't be pigeon holed to certain groups and social media offers a wider audience. It also allows brands develop a connection with consumers that may not be possible through other marketing strategies
